thread.title: We changed hotels after one night!
thread.title_full: We changed hotels after one night! - Review of Hotel Central Saint Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MUG2017
title: We changed hotels after one night!
text:
Noisy street, terrible blinds, tiny bed (hubby's feet were off the end!), t ny bathroom, and felt the security feeling was low/ risky. Staff were lovely enough, but facilities were lacking. We wouldn't go back... but we recommend the next hotel we jumped across to!
Room Tip: Don't bother!! See more room tips
